meta.description:
A restaurant needs to order tables from three different suppliers, A, B, and C. The cost of ordering each table from supplier A is $120, from supplier B is $110, and from supplier C is $100. The restaurant wants to minimize the total cost of the orders.

In addition, each order from supplier A will include 20 tables, while orders from suppliers B and C will include 15 tables each. The quantity of orders can only be whole numbers. The restaurant needs to order at least 150 tables.

Each order from supplier A will include 20 tables, while orders from suppliers B and C will include 15 tables each. The restaurant needs to order a maximum of 600 tables.

If the restaurant decides to order tables from supplier A, it must also order at least 30 tables from supplier B.

Furthermore, if the restaurant decides to order tables from supplier B, it must also order tables from supplier C.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per table from each supplier

params.name: tables_per_order
params.description: Number of tables per order from each supplier

vars.name: orders
vars.description: Number of orders from each supplier

vars.name: y_A
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if orders are made from supplier A

vars.name: y_B
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if orders are made from supplier B

objective.name: total_cost
objective.expr: quicksum(cost[s] * tables_per_order[s] * orders[s] for s in Suppliers)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of orders

constraints.name: min_tables
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(tables_per_order[s] * orders[s] for s in Suppliers)

constraints.name: max_tables
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(tables_per_order[s] * orders[s] for s in Suppliers)

constraints.name: supplier_A_condition
constraints.description: If ordering from A, must order at least 30 tables from B

constraints.name: supplier_B_condition
constraints.description: If ordering from B, must order from C

constraints.name: y_A_link
constraints.description: Link binary variable y_A with orders from A

constraints.name: y_B_link
constraints.description: Link binary variable y_B with orders from B
